channel.title: ~~~I Want To Make A Baby Cannon :) NEED Help Though ~~~
channel.description: ok i want to make a baby cannon lol. i have added so much stuff to my server so there os not much more to add but "The Baby Cannon" lol. sooooo im planning to use the item (fixed device [recolored]) and when it shoots i want it to shoot like an arrow but its actually a Baby. i have no clue how to go through with this so be detailed thanks! If This Works It Will Be Kick Ass :p

item.title: ~~~I Want To Make A Baby Cannon :) NEED Help Though ~~~
item.dc:creator: @mpsmpsmps mpsmpsmps
item.description:
@mpsmpsmps wrote:

[quote=“Espeon, post:8, topic:321648”][quote author=mpsmpsmps link=topic=418095.msg3076003#msg3076003 date=1261842022]
go to HELP section nub
[/quote]

This is the help section “nub”. It’s client-sided, idiot?

@OP, this is hella hard to do and I personally don’t have experience with models but I think RSPoser would come in handy if you needed any custom emotes, or SWATS emote system if you wanted a pre-made anim/gfx.[/quote]
no big mouth! silent cj moved it to this section.
i guess you won’t belive me… so ok look here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,418657.0.html

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Espeon, post:8, topic:321648”][quote author=mpsmpsmps link=topic=418095.msg3076003#msg3076003 date=1261842022]
go to HELP section nub
[/quote]

This is the help section “nub”. It’s client-sided, idiot?

@OP, this is hella hard to do and I personally don’t have experience with models but I think RSPoser would come in handy if you needed any custom emotes, or SWATS emote system if you wanted a pre-made anim/gfx.[/quote]
Maybe he meant model help? also…it would take about 10min’s to get the cannon resize down, if that(at least for me), after that adding the animation, I am out. I you want me to resize it, just askXD.

item.title: ~~~I Want To Make A Baby Cannon :) NEED Help Though ~~~
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:2, topic:321648”]I’m pretty sure for the arrow, you need to make a custom GFX. Also for the Re-Color, why not just use a regular cannon. Lastly, for the cannon code that allows you to set it up, dismantle ect. You need to get that, not many servers have fully operating cannons.

Best of luck,
~ Wolf[/quote]

Mine nearly did but I released it.

Read full topic
item.source: ~~~I Want To Make A Baby Cannon :) NEED Help Though ~~~

item.title: ~~~I Want To Make A Baby Cannon :) NEED Help Though ~~~
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

I’m pretty sure for the arrow, you need to make a custom GFX. Also for the Re-Color, why not just use a regular cannon. Lastly, for the cannon code that allows you to set it up, dismantle ect. You need to get that, not many servers have fully operating cannons.

Best of luck,

~ Wolf

Read full topic
